snippet: China aims to stamp out the voice of the Dalai Lama, the exiled Tibetan spiritual leader, by making his words inaccessible to Tibetans by any means, a top official said.
abstract: Chinese government cracks down on media and communications in Tibet, hoping to fully eradicate news of exiled spiritual leader Dalai Lama.
lead_paragraph: China aims to stamp out the voice of the Dalai Lama, the exiled Tibetan spiritual leader, by making his words inaccessible to Tibetans by any means, a top official said.

headline.main: China Aims to Fully Mute Dalai Lama
headline.print_headline: China Aims To Fully Mute Dalai Lama
